page.title: 10POLLUTION
page.content:
SEA POLLUTION
CHEMICAL WASTE, SEWAGE AND OIL SPILLAGE ARE RUINING THE ONCE PLEASANT BEACH AT FRESHFIELD. THIS POLLUTION IS SERIOUS BECAUSE IT INTERFERES WITH THE FOOD CHAINS. IT IS SO SMELLY ON THE BEACH THAT NO-ONE WOULD CHOOSE TO STAY THERE FOR LONG. THE CRESTS OF THE WAVES WERE BROWN.
LITTER
A BRIEF SURVEY, CUT SHORT BY THE INTOLERABLE STENCH FROM THE SEA, OF THE BEACH AT FRESHFIELD, REVEALED BROKEN GLASS, A RUSTY SPOON, SIX SOCKS, PLASTIC BAGS, RUBBER, OLD TIN CANS, CRATES DISCARDED BY FISHERMEN, AND OLD CAR TYRES.
